import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import DisplayError from './DisplayError' import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; const initialState = { data: { skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '', cfUserName: '', cfRating: '', cfMaxRating: '', cfRank: '', ccUserName: '', ccRating: '', ccMaxRating: '', ccRank: '' }, errors: { cfUserNameError: '', ccUserNameError: '', collegeError: '', }, } function AddProfile(){ const [ profile, setProfile ] = useState({ data: { skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '', cfUserName: '', cfRating: '', cfMaxRating: '', cfRank: '', cfMaxRank: '', cfProfile: '', ccUserName: '', ccRating: '', ccMaxRating: '', ccStars: '', ccProfile: '', githubUserName: '', githubRepos: [] }, errors: { cfUserNameError: '', ccUserNameError: '', githubUserName: '', batchError: '' }, }) const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() let cfUserNameError='', ccUserNameError='', githubUserNameError='', batchError='' let res1, res2, res3, res4, res5; try{ res1 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codeforces/${profile.data.cfUserName}`) if(res1.data.status==='Failed'){ cfUserNameError = 'Please enter valid codeforces user handle' } res2 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codechef/${profile.data.ccUserName}`) if(res2.data.status==='Failed'){ ccUserNameError = 'Please enter valid codechef user handle' } res3 = await axios.get(`https://api.github.com/users/${profile.data.githubUserName}/repos`) /*const { portfolio, linkedIn, facebook, instagram, twitter, skills, company } = profile.data const { cfUserName, cfRating, cfMaxRating, cfRank, cfMaxRank, cfProfile } = profile.data const { ccUserName, ccRating, ccMaxRating, ccStars, ccProfile } = profile.data const { githubUserName, githubRepos } = profile.data const { college, branch, batch, degree } = profile.data try { const config = { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'auth-token': localStorage.getItem('token') } } const profileInfo = { portfolio, linkedIn, facebook, instagram, twitter, skills, company } const cfInfo = { cfUserName, cfRating, cfMaxRating, cfRank, cfMaxRank, cfProfile } const ccInfo = { ccUserName, ccRating, ccMaxRating, ccStars, ccProfile } const githubInfo = { githubUserName, githubRepos } const eduInfo = { college, branch, batch, degree } res1 = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/profile', profileInfo, config) res2 = await axios.put('http://localhost:5000/profile/codeforcesProfile', cfInfo, config) res3 = await axios.put('http://localhost:5000/profile/codechefProfile', ccInfo, config) res4 = await axios.put('http://localhost:5000/profile/githubProfile', githubInfo, config) //res5 = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/profile/education', eduInfo, config) console.log(res1) console.log(res2) console.log(res3) console.log(res4) //console.log(res5) //console.log(profile.data) } catch (error) { console.log(error) }*/ } catch ( error ){ if(error.response.data.message==='Not Found'){ githubUserNameError = 'Please enter valid github username' } } if( cfUserNameError || ccUserNameError || githubUserNameError ) { return setProfile({ ...profile, errors: { cfUserNameError, ccUserNameError, githubUserNameError } }) } setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, cfRating: res1.data.rating, //cfRank: res1.data.rank, cfProfile: `https://codeforces.com/profile/${profile.data.cfUserName}` }}) setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, ccRating: res2.data.rating, ccMaxRating: res2.data.highest_rating, ccStars: res2.data.stars, ccProfile: `https://www.codechef.com/users/${profile.data.ccUserName}` }}) setProfile({ ...profile, data: { ...profile.data, githubRepos: res3.data } }) //console.log(res1.data.['max rank']) console.log(res2) console.log(res3) console.log(profile.data) } return (

My account

onSubmit(e) } >
Education and Profesional Details
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, college: e.target.value}}) } required />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, degree: e.target.value}}) } required />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, branch: e.target.value}}) } required />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, batch: e.target.value}}) } required />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, company: e.target.value}}) } />
Skills
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, skills: e.target.value}}) } required />
Coding Platform information
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, cfUserName: e.target.value}}) } />
{ profile.errors.cfUserNameError && }
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, ccUserName: e.target.value}}) } />
{ profile.errors.ccUserNameError && }
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, githubUserName: e.target.value}}) } />
{ profile.errors.githubUserNameError && }
Social information
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, portfolio: e.target.value}}) } />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, linkedIn: e.target.value}}) } />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, instagram: e.target.value}}) } />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, twitter: e.target.value}}) } />
setProfile({...profile, data: { ...profile.data, facebook: e.target.value}}) } />


) } export default AddProfile;
